item.title: Idefics Code Reading Notes
item.description: Background IDEFICS is a Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM) or Vision-Language Model (VLM) published first on arXiv on June 21, 2023, and then on HuggingFace on August 22, 2023. I had a chance to use this model to do some experiment but I have never had investigate the package in depth. Fortunately, the model is an open source code on the transformers repo on GitHub, which leaves me with some clues to learn more.

item.title: My First Post
